data.title: List of programs broadcast by the Nick Jr. Channel
data.meta_description: The following is a list of programs broadcast by the Nick Jr. Channel. It was launched on September 28, 2009 as a spin-off of Nickelodeon's long-running preschool programming block of the same name, which had aired since 1988. The channel features original series and reruns of programming from...
data.text:
This article uses content from Nick Jr. Wiki.

Please visit the Nick Jr. Wiki's article on List of programs broadcast by Nick Jr. for more information.

For a list of Noggin shows, see List of programs broadcast by Noggin.

This article is about a list of programs broadcast by the Nick Jr. Channel. For a list of programs broadcast by the Nickelodeon programming block, see List of programs broadcast by Nick Jr. (block).

The following is a list of programs broadcast by the Nick Jr. Channel. It was launched on September 28, 2009 as a spin-off of Nickelodeon's long-running preschool programming block of the same name, which had aired since 1988. The channel features original series and reruns of programming from Nickelodeon's weekday morning lineup. A late-night programming block aimed at parents, NickMom, aired on the Nick Jr. Channel from October 1, 2012 to September 28, 2015.[1][2]

The channel replaced Noggin, which was relaunched as a streaming service in 2015 and acts as a separate sister brand. Noggin's programming is distinct from the Nick Jr. Channel's; it mainly carried pre-teen-oriented programs at its launch,[3] and its 2015 streaming service features a variety of exclusive series.

Current programming[]

Original programming[]

An asterisk (*) indicates that the program has or had new episodes aired on the Nick Jr. Channel.

The following is a list of original shows (created and owned by Nickelodeon) that aired on the Nick Jr. Channel. Included are the shows' logos, titles, first and last air dates, and notes about their broadcast.

Animated series[]

Image Title Premiere date PAW Patrol August 12, 2013 Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. Blaze and the Monster Machines October 19, 2014[4] Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. Baby Shark's Big Show![note 1] December 12, 2020[5][6][7][8][9] Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. Face's Music Party June 6, 2022[10] Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. Rubble & Crew February 3, 2023 Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. Bossy Bear March 6, 2023 Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel.

Live-action series[]

Image Title Premiere date Blue's Clues & You! November 11, 2019[11] Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel. The Tiny Chef Show September 9, 2022[12][13][14] Currently airs on the Nick Jr. Channel, new episodes will air on Nickelodeon starting April 8, 2024.

Animated series[]

Image Title Premiere date Max & Ruby*[15] September 28, 2009 Peppa Pig[note 2] February 5, 2011[16] Hey Duggee July 11, 2016[17] The Adventures of Paddington*[note 2] December 22, 2019[18] JoJo & Gran Gran July 2, 2021 Kiri & Lou* June 13, 2022[19] Ended but still airing reruns on the Nick Jr. Channel.

Programming on Pluto TV[]

Pluto TV, a streaming service purchased by ViacomCBS in 2019, includes a channel dedicated to Nick Jr. programming, along with a Latino feed. The lineup consists of discontinued series from the Nick Jr. block and the TV channel.[20][21]

1 Latino feed only. This is the feed for Pluto US and not to be confused with the Latin America version.

2 English feed only.

Original programming[]

Animated series[]

Image Title First air date Last air date Rugrats July 12, 2014 July 28, 2014 Reruns briefly aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2014. Currently shown in reruns on Nick Pluto TV. Little Bill September 28, 2009[note 3] February 21, 2014 Reruns aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2014. Dora the Explorer September 28, 2009[note 3] February 11, 2024 Four episodes from the 8th and final season premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel rather than on Nickelodeon from July-August of 2019. Reruns continued to air on the Nick Jr. Channel until February 2024. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Oswald[note 4] September 28, 2009[note 3] December 11, 2014 Reruns of the series were aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until December 2014. The Backyardigans* September 28, 2009[note 3] August 30, 2018[22] Four episodes from the fourth and final season never aired on the main network and instead premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel from 2012 to 2013. Two episodes were left unaired on Nickelodeon and the Nick Jr. Channel. Reruns were aired until August 2018. Go, Diego, Go! September 28, 2009[note 3] August 31, 2018 The last premiere was on September 16, 2011, but the show continued to air on the Nick Jr. Channel until August 2018. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Wonder Pets!* September 28, 2009[note 3] August 30, 2018 Six episodes from the third and final season never aired on the main network and instead premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel from 2011 to 2016. Reruns were aired until August 2018. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Ni Hao, Kai-Lan* September 28, 2009[note 3] September 30, 2016 One episode, "Journey to Monkey King Castle," was left unaired on the main Nickelodeon network. It premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel on August 21, 2011. The show stopped rerunning regularly on February 24, 2015, but it returned for 3 weeks starting September 12, 2016. Team Umizoomi January 31, 2010[23] August 1, 2024 The last premiere was on April 24, 2015, but reruns continued to air on the Nick Jr. Channel until August 2024. Bubble Guppies January 30, 2011[24] August 1, 2024 The show ended in 2023, but reruns continued to air on the Nick Jr. Channel until August 2024. Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness May 15, 2016[25] Only two episodes aired on the Nick Jr. Channel for an unknown reason on May 15, 2016 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2012)[note 5] July 31, 2016 Wallykazam!* February 3, 2014 March 31, 2022 Many episodes were left unaired on the main network. They aired on the Nick Jr. Channel from May 2016 to September 2017. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. The show stopped rerunning regularly in 2020, but it returned with one airing on March 31, 2022. Dora and Friends: Into the City!* October 4, 2014[27][28][29] October 18, 2021 The show moved to the separate Nick Jr. Channel in February 2016, leaving many episodes unaired on the main network. Fresh Beat Band of Spies* June 15, 2015[30] October 29, 2021[31] According to The Futon Critic, many other episodes were scheduled to air on the main network but were pulled. Only four episodes aired on Nickelodeon before the show moved to the Nick Jr. Channel. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Shimmer and Shine* August 24, 2015 October 29, 2021[31] Many episodes were left unaired on the main network. They aired on the Nick Jr. Channel from March 2018 to February 2020. Reruns stopped in 2021. Winx Club*[note 6] August 3, 2015 August 23, 2016 Some episodes from season 6 and all of season 7 aired exclusively on the Nick Jr. Channel from August 2015 to April 2016. Reruns aired until August 2016. Harvey Beaks May 1, 2016[34] Only two episodes aired on the Nick Jr. Channel for an unknown reason on May 1, 2016. The Loud House May 7, 2016[34] May 8, 2016[35] Only four episodes aired on the Nick Jr. Channel for an unknown reason on May 7, 2016 to May 8, 2016. Nella the Princess Knight* February 6, 2017 December 15, 2019 The first 23 episodes were shown on the main network. Premieres aired on the separate Nick Jr. Channel from February 2018 to December 2019. Three episodes from the second and final season never aired on the Nick Jr. Channel and instead premiered on Paramount+ in July 2021. Sunny Day* July 7, 2017 December 15, 2019 The first 27 episodes were shown on the main network. Premieres aired on the separate Nick Jr. Channel from October 2018 to December 2019. 11 episodes never aired on the network and instead premiered on Amazon Prime Video in 2020. Butterbean's Café* November 13, 2018[36] August 13, 2021[37] Many episodes were left unaired on the main network. They premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel from August 2019 to August 2020. Reruns aired until August 2021. Santiago of the Seas October 10, 2020[38][39][40] February 11, 2024 Many episodes were left unaired on the main network and premiered on the Nick Jr. Channel in July 2023. Kinderwood December 3, 2021 June 4, 2021 Reruns briefly aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2021. The BeatBuds, Let's Jam! June 7, 2021[41] July 16, 2021[42] Reruns briefly aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2021. Kinderwood December 3, 2020 June 11, 2021 Reruns briefly aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2021. Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years November 13, 2022 A 2-hour marathon of aired on the Nick Jr. Channel despite the show being a Nicktoon on November 13, 2022. PAW Patrol was next after the marathon. It's possible that it was originally scheduled but Kamp Koral was accidentally aired instead.

Live-action series[]

Image Title First air date Last air date Gullah Gullah Island September 28, 2009[note 3] December 5, 2014 The show stopped rerunning regularly in 2013, but it returned for a winter-themed event with one airing on December 5, 2014. Blue's Clues September 28, 2009[note 3] July 1, 2019[43] Reruns aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2019. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Oobi September 28, 2009[note 3] March 11, 2013 Reruns aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2013. Blue's Room September 28, 2009[note 3] February 13, 2011[44] Reruns briefly aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2011. Jack's Big Music Show September 28, 2009[note 3] December 26, 2014 Reruns were shown from the channel's launch to 2013. The show stopped rerunning regularly in 2013, but it returned for a winter-themed event on December 26, 2014. The Upside Down Show[note 7] September 28, 2009[note 3] March 1, 2012 Reruns aired on the Nick Jr. Channel until 2012. The Fresh Beat Band* September 28, 2009[note 3] July 2, 2016 Five episodes were left unaired on the main network. They aired on the Nick Jr. Channel from August 2012 to December 2013. Reruns stopped in 2016. Currently shown in reruns on the Nick Jr. Pluto TV channel. Zoofari* February 5, 2018 October 19, 2018 The show aired nine times on the Nick Jr. block before moving to the separate Nick Jr. Channel, where premieres aired from March to October 2018. Noggin Knows* May 28, 2021 July 30, 2021 The last premiere was on June 25, 2021, but the show continued to air on the Nick Jr. Channel until July 2021.
